definitions.definition: A trembling or quivering , especially one caused by emotion ; a frisson.
A cause of sudden excitement ; a kick .
A slight quivering of the heart that accompanies a cardiac murmur .
A breathing place or hole ; a nostril , as of a bird .

main_definition: A trembling or quivering , especially one caused by emotion ; a frisson.
secondary_definitions: A cause of sudden excitement ; a kick .
( medicine ) A slight quivering of the heart that accompanies a cardiac murmur .
A breathing place or hole ; a nostril , as of a bird .
